channel.title: Comments on: Miles Morales on PS4 is still pretty fun. Edited to the track – On My Own by Kid Cudi and Jaden Smith

item.title: By: LockingSwitch
item.dc:creator: LockingSwitch
item.description: Is there a reason why it wouldn't be fun not even 18 months after release?
item.content:encoded: Is there a reason why it wouldn’t be fun not even 18 months after release?

item.title: By: Marc_J92
item.dc:creator: Marc_J92
item.description: Why wouldnâ€™t it still be fun on the PS4?
item.content:encoded: Why wouldnâ€™t it still be fun on the PS4?

item.title: By: Nivriil
item.dc:creator: Nivriil
item.description: Why is miles moving like a flip book character while the world is normal?
item.content:encoded: Why is miles moving like a flip book character while the world is normal?

item.title: By: Queef-Elizabeth
item.dc:creator: Queef-Elizabeth
item.description: I loved when the music kicks in, in the beginning of the game. I just kept swinging until it was done. Not a huge Jaden fan but the song is pretty good
item.content:encoded: I loved when the music kicks in, in the beginning of the game. I just kept swinging until it was done. Not a huge Jaden fan but the song is pretty good

item.title: By: DafneOrlow
item.dc:creator: DafneOrlow
item.description: This is one I'm looking at getting soon. Recently started Spiderman and was very surprised to find out you actually get to play as Miles (and MJ). It was totally unexpected and got me all kinds of hype for his own game.
item.content:encoded: This is one I’m looking at getting soon. Recently started Spiderman and was very surprised to find out you actually get to play as Miles (and MJ). It was totally unexpected and got me all kinds of hype for his own game.

item.title: By: ranfdom
item.dc:creator: ranfdom
item.description: Extremely popular modern game still fun months after release what a crazy thing. Redditors really are retarded, and upvote the dumbest shit.
item.content:encoded: Extremely popular modern game still fun months after release what a crazy thing. Redditors really are retarded, and upvote the dumbest shit.

item.title: By: NerdStupid
item.dc:creator: NerdStupid
item.description: I read it's only like a 5-10 hour game. Is that true? Doesn't seem worth it at all for $50 just to have a few new mechanics over spiderman 2018.
item.content:encoded: I read it’s only like a 5-10 hour game. Is that true? Doesn’t seem worth it at all for $50 just to have a few new mechanics over spiderman 2018.
